Ohh Snap! Photo Booth

Lafayette's Modern versions of the traditional photo booth.

Creating memorable photo booth experiences for your .

Event Photography is essential to any type of event. Long gone is the bulky box or the make shift tripod setup. Our modern day photo booth is built to be a beautiful and elegant solution to any event. Scroll down to find your type of event.
